main event: An observer saw a bright silver or aluminum object climbing straight up in a hovering, circular motion for 1.5 minutes.
interesting points: The object was described as having a half-dollar shape.,There was no tail, trail, or exhaust visible from the object.,The observer reported no sound emitted by the object., Several possibilities for the object's identity included balloons and aircraft., The observation took place at dusk.
witness description: Mr. [REDACTED], 32, insurance consultant, Oklahoma City, Oklahoma
